headline.main: College Drinking: Changes in Attitude and Habit

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Despite the adoption by all 50 states of the 21-year-old legal drinking age and the tightening of alcohol policies on virtually every campus, most college students continue to drink regularly and often heavily.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Despite the adoption by all 50 states of the 21-year-old legal drinking age and the tightening of alcohol policies on virtually every campus, most college students continue to drink regularly and often heavily.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Many smokers are threatening to quit flying. This is because of a new law making it a crime to smoke on almost every commercial flight in the United States.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Many smokers are threatening to quit flying. This is because of a new law making it a crime to smoke on almost every commercial flight in the United States.
